languages.text: "Йегер, по какому протоколу ты сейчас действуешь? И отдаешь ли себе отчет в том, что он саботирует приказ маршала?"
"Yeager, can you tell me what protocol you are following at this time? You do realise that your unauthorised actions are contradicting the Marshal's orders?"
languages.original_text: "Йегер, по какому протоколу ты сейчас действуешь? И отдаешь ли себе отчет в том, что он саботирует приказ маршала?"

traits.locale_text: "Yeager, can you tell me what protocol you are following at this time? You do realise that your unauthorised actions are contradicting the Marshal's orders?"
"Yeager, can you tell me what protocol you are following at this time? You do realise that your unauthorised actions are contradicting the Marshal's orders?"
"Yeager, can you tell me what protocol you are following at this time? You do realise that your unauthorised actions are contradicting the Marshal's orders?"
"Yeager, can you tell me what protocol you are following at this time? You do realise that your unauthorised actions are contradicting the Marshal's orders?"
"Yeager, can you tell me what protocol you are following at this time? You do realise that your unauthorised actions are contradicting the Marshal's orders?"
"Yeager, can you tell me what protocol you are following at this time? You do realise that your unauthorised actions are contradicting the Marshal's orders?"

languages.text: “耶格尔，可以告诉我你现在遵循的是什么协议吗？你未经授权的行为违背了元帅的命令，这一点你应该很清楚吧？”
languages.original_text: "Yeager, can you tell me what protocol you are following at this time? You do realise that your unauthorised actions are contradicting the Marshal's orders?"

traits.locale_text: “耶格尔，可以告诉我你现在遵循的是什么协议吗？你未经授权的行为违背了元帅的命令，这一点你应该很清楚吧？”

languages.text: 「イェーガー、現在どのプロトコルに従っているのか教えてもらえるか？君の無許可の行動が将帥の命令に反していることを理解しているのか？」
languages.original_text: "Yeager, can you tell me what protocol you are following at this time? You do realise that your unauthorised actions are contradicting the Marshal's orders?"

traits.locale_text: 「イェーガー、現在どのプロトコルに従っているのか教えてもらえるか？君の無許可の行動が将帥の命令に反していることを理解しているのか？」

languages.text: «Yeager, ¿puede decirme qué protocolo está siguiendo esta vez? ¿Es consciente de que sus actos no autorizados contradicen las órdenes del Mariscal?».
languages.original_text: "Yeager, can you tell me what protocol you are following at this time? You do realise that your unauthorised actions are contradicting the Marshal's orders?"

traits.locale_text: «Yeager, ¿puede decirme qué protocolo está siguiendo esta vez? ¿Es consciente de que sus actos no autorizados contradicen las órdenes del Mariscal?».

languages.text: "Yeager, könnt Ihr mir sagen, welchem Protokoll Ihr aktuell folgt? Ihr wisst schon, dass Euer nicht autorisiertes Handeln im Widerspruch zu den Befehlen des Marschalls steht?"
languages.original_text: "Yeager, can you tell me what protocol you are following at this time? You do realise that your unauthorised actions are contradicting the Marshal's orders?"

traits.locale_text: "Yeager, könnt Ihr mir sagen, welchem Protokoll Ihr aktuell folgt? Ihr wisst schon, dass Euer nicht autorisiertes Handeln im Widerspruch zu den Befehlen des Marschalls steht?"

languages.text: "Yeager, şu an hangi protokolü takip ettiğini söyler misin? İzinsiz davranışlarının Miralay'ın emirleriyle çatıştığının ayırdında mısın?"
languages.original_text: "Yeager, can you tell me what protocol you are following at this time? You do realise that your unauthorised actions are contradicting the Marshal's orders?"

traits.locale_text: "Yeager, iu an hangi protokolü takip ettiğini söyler misin? İzinsiz davranışlarının Miralay'ın emirleriyle çatıştığının ayırdında mısın?"

languages.text: « Yeager, quel protocole suivez-vous actuellement ? Vous comprenez que vos actions sont interdites et contreviennent aux ordres du maréchal ? »
languages.original_text: "Yeager, can you tell me what protocol you are following at this time? You do realise that your unauthorised actions are contradicting the Marshal's orders?"

traits.locale_text: « Yeager, quel protocole suivez-vous actuellement ? Vous comprenez que vos actions sont interdites et contreviennent aux ordres du maréchal ? »
